greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Eigentriangle, row sums = A076739, the number of compositions into Fibonacci numbers.
comment: Row sums = A076739 starting with offset 1: (1, 2, 4, 7, 14, 26, 49,...).
Left border = A010056, the characteristic function of the Fibonacci numbers Starting with offset 1: (1, 1, 1, 0, 1,...).
Sum of n-th row terms = rightmost term of next row.
formula: T(n,k) = A010056(n-k+1)*A076739(k-1). A010056, the characteristic function of the Fibonacci numbers, starts with offset 1: (1, 1, 1, 0, 1,...). A076739(k-1), the INVERTi transform of (1, 1, 1, 0, 1,...) starts with offset 0: (1, 1, 2, 4, 7, 14,...).
example: First few rows of the triangle =
Example: row 5 = (1, 0, 2, 4, 7) = termwise product of (1, 0, 1, 1, 1) and (1, 1, 2, 4, 7).
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Sep 12 2008
